# 1. Assigning and using variables

```{r}

A <- 1
B <- 2
C <- 3

```

```{r}
# Perform basic math operations by using the variables instead of the numbers
# assigned to them:

D <- A + B
C <- 2*A*B^B  # We can also overwrite variables

C + D
```
